mapper.select: select r.*, f.field, rg.region from resume r join field f on r.field_num = f.field_num join region rg on r.region_num = rg.region_num where r.r_num = #{r_num}
select m.* from member m join resume r on m.id = r.id where r.r_num = #{r_num}

select r.*, m.name, m.matching from resume r join member m on r.id = m.id join field f on r.field_num = f.field_num join region rg on r.region_num = rg.region_num
where r_name like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') where r_content like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') where m.name like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') where f.field like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') where rg.region like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
order by r.r_num desc
order by m.matching desc, r.r_num desc order by r.r_salary desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}

select count(r.r_num) from resume r join member m on r.id = m.id join field f on r.field_num = f.field_num join region rg on r.region_num = rg.region_num
where r_name like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') where r_content like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') where m.name like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') where f.field like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') where rg.region like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
select * from scrap_resume where r_num = #{r_num} and id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into resume(r_num, id, region_num, field_num, r_name, r_career, r_tech, r_form, r_salary, r_exp, r_content, r_file) values(#{r_num}, #{id}, #{region_num}, #{field_num}, #{r_name}, #{r_career}, #{r_tech}, #{r_form}, #{r_salary}, #{r_exp}, #{r_content}, #{r_file})
mapper.update: update resume set region_num = #{region_num}, field_num = #{field_num}, r_name = #{r_name}, r_career = #{r_career}, r_tech = #{r_tech}, r_form = #{r_form}, r_salary = #{r_salary}, r_exp = #{r_exp}, r_content = #{r_content}, r_file = #{r_file} where r_num = #{r_num}
